EnumProperty.Description:
Code Json: Receive parameters and transforms into a Json string.
Decode Json: Receive Json string and returns all the keys and values​​. Also look for a key in Json string.
Replace Text With Json: Receive Json string and text. Values ​​in the text is replaced with the Json string keys, the keys in the text should be %key%

StringProperty.Description: Is the key or identifier element in Json string

Unit.Description: Component parameters json encoding, decoding and replacement Json string in a text
